Sygnal Webflow ID | MUID ( micro-UUID ) Generator

by Sygnal Technology Group

Demonstration

MUID ( Micro-UUID's )

  • Generates a MUID ( micro-UUID ) based on a cryptographically-strong UUID v4
  • MUIDs are URL-safe and take up 31.25% less characters than UUIDs while encoding the same amount of information
  • Using cryptographic API
